Eager to explore new opportunities in the dynamic field of technology and contribute expertise to innovative projects. Strong problem-solving and analytical skills, with a commitment to staying updated with industry trends and best practices.

projects.name: Career Guidance Website
projects.description: This website helps the user to find the best career option regarding the choice of interest in the fields which the user like the most. It is developed using the technologies like HTML, CSS, JAVASCRIPT, NODEJS, EXPRESS, MONGODB. Currently working on integrating AI-Conversational Model (Chatbot)

projects.name: Face Recognition Based Attendance System
projects.description: This project helps in detecting the peoples and recognising them with the help of their facial structure which can be used on in many fileds to identify peoples or in educational business institutes to mark the attendance of the peoples. This project is developed using technologies like HTML, CSS, JAVASCRIPT, PYTHON LIBRARIES and Flask.

experiences.description: My internship journey with SmartKnower in the domain of data science using python, where I learned to analyse data set and perform the required operations. The skills which I learn and acquired are Data Manipulation and Analysis, Programming, Machine Learning, Data Visualisation. I have done Projects during internship such as Mobile price Prediction and Sentiments Ananlysis.
